thread.section_title: London Visitors Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean and friendly
thread.title_full: Clean and friendly - Review of London Visitors Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Eugenia S
title: Clean and friendly
text: We enjoy the time what we spend in London visitors hotel. Good customer service everything was clean. Maybe a little bit narrow but for this money it was more than enough! Really good quiet area with stores pubs and park. Not so far from first zone, we was walking and enjoying view but if you don't like walking it's a train station 3 minutes of walking what will cost you 6.60£ a ticket for all day in first two zones. ❤️
